attributes.action: Ban companies from using automated systems to call homes for selling.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Even when you are registered with TPS (Telephone Preference Service) with BT, you are at home, concentrating on things, having dinner, spending time with your family, etc... etc... and the phone rings. It then either hangs up on you as there was no customer service operative available when you answered (even though they rang you) or you get an automated message about a competition draw, becoming debt free, accident claims, etc...

This is absurd! How are companies legally allowed to  interupt our lives with such annoyances?

Sales calls were annoying enough as it was, now they don't even have the decency to ring themselves, they have machines to do it!

This practice should be outlawed.

reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
